page.title: 12Stithians Show information
page.content: Stithians show is a one day agricultural celebration. It has been held once a year for a hundred and fifty years. When it started it was very small. Now many people come and St Stythians band, the chairman, the Vice president and the president and his wife march up from the shop at half past ten in the morning then the president declares the show open. People win a lot of prizes and trophies for showing their dogs, cows, goats, horses, art work and cookery. They go to the show ground at about seven o'clock in the morning to set up. For some people it is the day of the year. It is a family show and at the end of the day all you can hear is traffic roaring away while the police men are guiding them out of Stithians.
